Welcome.preMessage: Hey, welcome back to the village! You can move by touching the screen with your left thumb, and then moving it in the direction you want to go. Now press 'Ok' and go to speak to the other villagers.

The arrow.preMessage: Woo!! That colored scarf!!! It's such a good piece of news, you must tell it right away to the chief of the village!! Do you see the arrow on the top of the screen? It will guide you to him.

Initial story.preMessage: Oh!! I couldn't believe it until I saw it! Do you you know it's been ages since our last colored item was found on this planet? Wait... it must be a sign... go to the south and speak to the Old Man, he will explain everithing to you. I feel that after your discovery something could change in this world: I put all my hope on you.

The prophecy.preMessage: So the chief of the village sent you to me, ahn? Wait... what do my old eyes see? It's a colored scarf!! What a unique event!! Now I'll tell you a story. In this world there have always been two races: the Trilight, lively and cheerful beings able to control the colors, and the Klamers, loyal and combative beings who protected the Trilight and fed with colors. However, at a certain point this harmony got broken: the Klamers prevailed and stole all the colors from this world, leaving our race heart-sick and unable to be useful to the world.

First enemy.preMessage: Waaaa!! An enemy spider, watch out!! You can't fight enemies at the moment, so just run!! Keep on going south to the Sanctuary

Sanctuary gate.preMessage: Here you are. This is the Green Sanctuary gate.

Village under attack.preMessage: Thank god you're back!! Enemies are coming from west and are attacking our people!! Go and help the villagers!!

Using spells.preMessage: You'll have to use your new spell!! Use your right thumb to cast spell against enemies!!

Kill heavy spider.preMessage: Spiders are attacking us!! Kill the big one north of our house!!

Coloring.preMessage: Thanks a lot for helping us!! Do you know that you can recover health by coloring an object and by staying near to it? Now try to color our house.

To the forest.preMessage: As you just saw enemies can be very dangerous. I think you should go to the forest and find where they're coming from. Do you see that the house lost again its colour? Always remember that enemies cand decolor things!!

To the boss.preMessage: This place is full of spiders, watch out!!

The boss.preMessage: Beyond that spider net, you'll find the Mother of all spiders. You should prepare for combat, be careful.

Welcome to the north.preMessage: No way,so the colors are coming back then? my cousin in the green world told me about this. Although up here in the north theres not that much difference, everything is white HA!.Get moving, go to the sanctuary our rangers say that they could see lights coming out of the old forest. Check it out.

Ice Rangers.preMessage: hey get out of here,this is dangerous. Oh wait that scarf?!I guess your the new one of the greenLand,we are the Ice Rangers, guardians of the north from the Klamers .Try to find out whats going on in the old forest.

Back alive.preMessage: What? You're alive? You found a Crystal?for the Black and White, so many trilights have died entering the old frozen forest Sanctuary. Anyway there is no time to waste. Head to the east Ranger, he says wierd sounds have come out from the old timberland

Up the road.preMessage: Hi there, your the Color Bringer right? Well atleast thats how the Klamers refer to you.Please check whats going on down this road.
Hi there, your the Color Bringer right? Well atleast thats how the Klamers refer to you...Please check whats going on down this road, I'll be back waiting for reinforcements
